column1:
How to use:

1.  Make a copy of the spreadsheet and name accordingly to your experiment
2. Fill in all relevant information
3. Share with key stakeholders and get approval
4. In case of changes keep the file up to date

column2: “Outbound marketing has no impact on product conversion”
All customers that joined less than 12 months
Every % in product adoption increase leads to appx. $50M incremental revenue.
Do not proactively engage with customers
Get send one email with personalised product recommendations

Product conversion rate:
 [# of customers with at least 1 product adopted / # of customers in Audience]
